item.title: 地缘政治紧张局势加剧，淡马锡寻求国内投资
item.description: 淡马锡控股私人有限公司（Temasek Holdings Pte）将重点投资于大型、以国内业务为主的公司，以规避与全球一触即发的地缘政治紧张局势相关的风险。【原文：Temasek Holdings Pte will focus on investing in companies with large, domestic-focused businesses as it seeks to avoid risks tied to simmering geopolitical tensions around the world.】

item.title: 彼得-蒂尔的风险投资公司通过投资 Polymarket 支持选举投注
item.description: 彼得-蒂尔（Peter Thiel）的风险投资公司创始人基金（Founders Fund）正将赌注押在最大的加密预测市场之一上，尽管美国的一个重要监管机构正加紧努力限制此类平台上的活动。【原文：Peter Thiel’s venture-capital firm Founders Fund is betting on one of the largest crypto-based prediction markets even as a key US regulator steps up efforts to restrict activity on such platforms.】

item.title: 数十亿资金退出主题 ETF，交易者不再追捧热门主题
item.description: 在 "一切皆有可能 "的大流行时代蓬勃发展之后，一种曾经风靡一时的投资策略正在重新失宠，一些小众 ETF 提供商也因此受到冲击。【原文：After booming in the anything-goes pandemic era, a once-fashionable investment strategy is falling out of favor anew, hitting some niche ETF providers along the way.】

item.title: 在与监管机构的建设性会谈中，BFF 首席执行官对派息充满信心
item.description: BFF Bank SpA 首席执行官马西米利亚诺-贝林赫里（Massimiliano Belingheri）相信，在意大利银行的调查结束后，该银行将能够恢复其赔付政策。【原文：BFF Bank SpA’s Chief Executive Officer Massimiliano Belingheri is confident the bank will be able to resume its payout policy after the conclusion of the Bank of Italy’s probe.】

item.title: 沙特经济 "过热 "担忧成为计划制约因素
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯希望在引导投资时避免使经济过度发展，其目标是使国家摆脱对石油的依赖。【原文：Saudi Arabia wants to avoid sending the economy into overdrive as it channels investments with the goal of pivoting the nation away from oil dependency.】

item.title: 科恩称高利率阻碍投资者冒险
item.description: 曾担任美国前总统唐纳德-特朗普首席经济顾问的加里-科恩说，长期的高利率阻碍了投资者承担风险，因为他们选择将资金投入更安全的国债。【原文：An extended period of elevated interest rates is preventing investors from taking risks as they choose to put funds in safer government debt instead, said Gary Cohn, who served as chief economic adviser to former President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 通用大西洋公司将通过设立地区办事处深化中东业务
item.description: 通用大西洋公司（General Atlantic）是一家投资公司，其投资对象包括 Facebook 公司和 Airbnb 公司，该公司计划在中东开设办事处，以加深与这个资金雄厚地区的联系。【原文：General Atlantic, the investment firm whose bets have included Facebook Inc. and Airbnb Inc., plans to open offices in the Middle East as part of its efforts to deepen ties to the cash-rich region.】

item.title: 中国锂矿产商不惧电动汽车电池产能过剩
item.description:
价格下滑和美国关税并没有让这些公司感到不安，它们似乎更加关注长期增长。【原文：

A price slump and US tariffs aren’t fazing the companies, which appear to be more focused on long-term growth.

】

item.title: 华尔街通过交易新兴市场 "特殊情况 "获得 97% 的回报率
item.description: 购买评级最低的国家出售的债务令大多数投资者望而却步。不过，在全球新兴市场研究台上，这种风险赌注被称为 "特殊情况"，而且越来越受欢迎。【原文：Buying debt sold by the lowest-rated countries scares off most investors. On emerging markets desks across the globe though, that type of risky wager is being dubbed “special situations” — and its popularity is growing.】

item.title: 俄罗斯海运原油出口降至两个月最低点
item.description:
波罗的海主要港口货运量减少，出口下降

【原文：

Exports fall as fewer cargoes are shipped from key Baltic ports

】

item.title: 世界上历史最悠久的对冲基金之一是如何破产的？
item.description: 这是对冲基金先驱乔治-韦斯下达的命令：卖掉全部卖掉【原文：The order came down from George Weiss, hedge fund pioneer: Sell. Sell it all.】

item.title: 德国联邦金融管理局称，随着利率上升，德国保险公司对私人信贷持冷淡态度
item.description: 据德国最高金融监管机构称，随着利率上升，流动性较高的资产类别更具吸引力，德国保险公司对私人信贷的热情正在降低。【原文：German insurers are becoming less enthusiastic about private credit as rising interest rates make asset classes with higher liquidity more attractive, according to the country’s top financial regulator.】

item.title: 美国银行任命菲尔-德雷克（Phil Drake）为英国股票资本市场主管
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp.）任命了三位新的欧洲、中东和非洲股票资本市场业务领导人，其中菲尔-德雷克（Phil Drake）担任英国 ECM 业务主管。【原文：Bank of America Corp. appointed three new leaders in its equity capital markets business in Europe, Middle East and Africa, including Phil Drake as head of UK ECM.】

item.title: 回报率达 30% 的新兴市场基金押注土耳其小型股
item.description: 一家业绩最佳的新兴市场基金押注土耳其小盘股的反弹，因为该国正在降低通胀。【原文：A top-performing emerging-market fund is betting on a rally in Turkish small-cap stocks as the country brings down inflation.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。投资者在等待通胀数据，meme 股票热潮卷土重来，英美资源集团计划重塑自身。以下是市场动态。【原文：Good morning. Investors await inflation data, the meme stock craze returns and Anglo American plans to reshape itself. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Sam Unsted】

item.title: 家得宝在房地产市场低迷的情况下销售额第六次下滑
item.description: 家得宝公司（Home Depot Inc.【原文：Home Depot Inc.’s string of negative sales extended into a sixth straight quarter as the big-box retailer struggles to overcome a weak housing market and lower demand for big-ticket items.】

item.title: 国债随利率上扬 交易员为关键通胀数据做好准备
item.description: 交易员们在等待关键的美国物价数据，这些数据可能会刺激人们对美联储今年更大幅度、更快地削减利率的预期。【原文：Treasuries extended their advance as traders await key US price data that could spur expectations for deeper and faster interest-rate cuts from the Federal Reserve this year.】

item.title: 药明康德称母公司拥有一家 DNA 先驱公司，但从未获取过数据
item.description: 药明康德公司告诉美国方面，其母公司曾拥有一家公司，该公司是早期大规模基因测序的先驱，但药明康德从未接触过这些数据。【原文：WuXi AppTec Co. told the US that its parent previously owned a company that was an early pioneer in widescale genetic sequencing, though it never had access to the data.】

item.title: 22 起自动驾驶汽车事故后，Alphabet 旗下 Waymo 遭到美国调查
item.description: 美国最高汽车安全监管部门对 Alphabet 公司旗下的自动驾驶汽车子公司 Waymo 展开调查，此前该公司的汽车发生了 22 起涉及碰撞或可能违反交通法规的事件。【原文：The top US auto-safety regulator opened an investigation into Waymo, the autonomous-vehicle subsidiary of subsidiary of Alphabet Inc., after 22 incidents in which the company’s cars were involved in collisions or may have violated traffic laws.】

item.title: 外国私人投资者将成为央行债券购买的主力军
item.description: 有史以来，海外私人投资者首次超过外国中央银行，成为美国政府债务的第二大持有者。【原文：For the first time on record, private investors overseas are poised to overtake foreign central banks as the second-largest holder of US government debt.】

item.title: 美国小型企业乐观情绪今年首次上升
item.description: 随着销售预期的改善，美国小型企业的乐观情绪在 4 月份出现了今年以来的首次反弹，而计划提价的业主比例则降至一年来的最低点。【原文：US small-business optimism rebounded for the first time this year in April as sales expectations improved, while the share of owners planning price increases fell to a one-year low.】

item.title: Grifols 因卖空者 Gotham 批评资金转移而下跌
item.description: 做空机构 Gotham City Research 发布了一份新的报告，指责这家医疗保健公司将股东的资金转移到了前高管持有的公司名下，随后 Grifols SA 股价下跌。【原文：Grifols SA shares fell after short-seller Gotham City Research released a new report accusing the healthcare company of transferring funds from its shareholders to a vehicle held by former executives.】

item.title: 澳大利亚大选前的支出使预算重现赤字
item.description: 周二公布的预算文件显示，2025财年澳大利亚政府的财政赤字将达到283亿澳元，占国内生产总值的1%，并在随后的12个月内增至428亿澳元。2025 财年的赤字是经济学家估计的两倍多，而 2025 财年的赤字将达到 420 亿澳元。【原文：Australia is preparing to unleash a wave of spending from power bill subsidies to tax breaks for critical minerals and new warships as the center-left government tries to win over voters ahead of an election due in a year.The government’s books will swing back to a deficit of A$28.3 billion, or 1% of gross domestic product, in fiscal 2025, swelling to A$42.8 billion in the following 12 months, budget papers released on Tuesday showed. The 2025 deficit is more than double economists’ estimates an】

item.title: 南非失业率上升，大选前非国大面临压力
item.description: 南非第一季度失业率升至一年来的最高水平，这可能会损害执政党非洲人国民大会（African National Congress）在 5 月 29 日大选前说服选民相信其有能力创造就业机会的努力。【原文：South Africa’s first quarter unemployment rate rose to the highest level in a year, potentially hurting the ruling African National Congress’s efforts to convince voters of its ability to create jobs ahead of elections on May 29.】

item.title: 英国央行行长皮尔称夏季降息是新的鸽派信号
item.description: 英国央行首席经济学家休-皮尔（Huw Pill）表示，夏季降息已经提上日程，但他提醒说，要抑制英国国内的物价压力，"仍有一些工作要做"。【原文：Bank of England Chief Economist Huw Pill said a summer interest-rate cut is on the table but cautioned there is “still some work to do” to curb domestic price pressures in the UK.】

item.title: 高盛希望吸引富裕客户在海湾地区投入现金
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. is planning to launch several investment strategies that will allow the firm and its wealthy clients to deploy capital in the Gulf’s public markets.】

item.title: Nuvama 称，MSCI 指数的调整可推动 20 亿美元资金流入印度股市
item.description: Nuvama Wealth Management Ltd.称，在对摩根斯坦利资本国际公司（MSCI Inc.【原文：India’s stocks are poised to see about $2 billion of passive inflows after a review of MSCI Inc.’s gauges, according to Nuvama Wealth Management Ltd.】

item.title: 德国投资者信心大增，经济复苏初见成效
item.description: 投资者对德国经济的信心连续第10个月上升，这反映出人们对德国经济在经历了一年多的近乎停滞后正在恢复增长持乐观态度。【原文：Investor confidence in Germany’s economy rose for a 10th month — reflecting optimism that growth is returning after more than a year of near-stagnation.】

item.title: 南非部长在反对必和必拓竞购后对英格洛计划表示欢迎
item.description: 英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）在拒绝了必和必拓集团（BHP Group）的两项收购提议后，宣布计划分拆其铂金业务部门，作为重大调整的一部分。【原文：South Africa’s mines minister struck a conciliatory tone as Anglo American Plc announced plans to separate its platinum unit as part of a major shakeup following its rejection of two approaches from BHP Group.】

item.title: 匈牙利炼油厂 Mol 揭幕耗资 14 亿美元的石化厂
item.description: 匈牙利炼油厂 Mol Nyrt 斥资 14 亿美元为其多元醇工厂举行了落成典礼，并称该工厂是一项长期投资，将在最初不利的市场环境中渡过难关。【原文：Hungarian refiner Mol Nyrt inaugurated its $1.4 billion polyol plant, describing the facility as a long-term investment that will ride out an initially unfavorable market.】
